name: Dance Dance Revolution: Hottest Party 3
description:
DanceDanceRevolution is sure to be the life of the party and get you
into shape with outrageous multiplayer fun, huge smash hit soundtrack,
entirely new modes and more!

Features

• Work out to the beat using your DanceDanceRevolution Controller or now
introducing compatibility with the Wii Balance Board for
DanceDanceRevolution Hottest Party 3
• Exclusive gimmicks such as the
Hip Roll and Bump Arrows appear in-game.
• Punch while moving your
hips, enjoy working out and help get your body in shape
• Exciting
new costume customization of your DanceDanceRevolution Hottest Party 3
dancer or use your Mii
• Inclusion of 60 tracks on disk, featuring
major licensed master, original and Latin tracks including:
•
“Disturbia”/Rihanna
• “Closer”/Ne-Yo
•
“So What”/Pink
• “Pocketful of Sunshine”/Natasha
Bedingfield
• “Viva La Vida”/Coldplay
• “La
Camisa Negra”/Juanes
• “Daftpunk is Playing at My House”/LCD
Soundsystem
• “Let’s Get It Started”/Black Eyed Peas
•
Extensive new modes in DanceDanceRevolution Hottest Party 3, including a
fresh new Work Out Mode and Kids Modes with much simpler controls and
Lesson Mode to practice timing and the direction of arrows so that new
dancers can learn the basics
• With a completely new Lesson Mode "DDR
School", you can learn how to play DanceDanceRevolution with ease on
your Wii.
